document.title: NI 43-101 Technical Report for the Aripuana Project in Brazil dated November 2020.pdf
document.description: This technical report, prepared for Nexa Resources S.A., provides a comprehensive overview and evaluation of the Aripuanã Zinc Project located in the State of Mato Grosso, Brazil, including resource estimates, mining methods, and environmental considerations.
